棨字的基本解释

棨
qǐ
古代用木头做的一种通行证，略似戟形：棨信。
古代官吏出行的一种仪仗，木制，形状似戟：棨戟。

棨字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qǐ］
［《廣韻》康禮切，上薺，溪。］
亦作“綮1”。
(1)古代用木制成的符信，出入关津时用作凭证。
(2)有缯衣的戟。为古代官吏出行时用作前导的一种仪仗。
(3)制茶用具。
(4)指用棨穿茶。

棨字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　棨； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页534第02
【唐韻】【韻會】康禮切【集韻】遣禮切【正韻】祛禮切，?音啓。【說文】傳信也。【韻會】形如戟，有旛，書之，吏執爲信。【後漢·竇武傳】取棨信，閉諸禁門。【前漢·文帝紀註】棨者，刻木爲合符也。　又【玉篇】兵攔也。【前漢·匈奴傳】有衣之戟曰棨。【師古曰】以赤黑繒爲之。【崔豹·古今註】棨戟，殳之遺象也。前驅之器，以木爲之。後世以赤油韜之，謂之油戟，亦謂之棨戟，王公以下通用之以前驅。

棨字的起名意思

用木刻制的一种符信，凭此可通过关卡。

棨
Basic explanation of words
棨
qǐ
An ancient pass made of wood, slightly like a halberd: Jixin.
A kind of ceremonial guard used by ancient officials to travel. It was made of wood and shaped like a halberd: halberd.
棨
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [qǐ]
["Guangyun" Kang Liqie, upper water chestnut, stream. ]
Also known as "綮1".
(1) The ancient talisman made of wood was used as a voucher when entering and leaving Guanjin.
(2) A halberd with a sash. It was a kind of ceremonial guard used as a guide when the ancient officials went out.
(3) Tea utensils.
(4) Refers to using tea to wear tea.
棨
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　棨; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 534 No. 02
[Tang Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Kang Liqie [Jiyun] Send Liqie [Zheng Yun] Qu Liqie,? Yinqi. [Said the text] The letter is also transmitted. [Rhyme Club] It is shaped like a halberd, with flags, and books, and the staff is the letter. 【The Legend of Later Han·Dou Wu】Take the letter and close all the forbidden doors. [Annotation to the Records of Emperor Wen of the Former Han Dynasty] For those who have carved wood, it is a coincidence.　[Jade articles] Barriers also. [Previous Han · Xiongnu Biography] The halberd with clothes is called Di. [Shigu said] The red and black tape is used as it. [Cui Bao·Annotation from Ancient to Modern] The halberd is also the remains of the elephant. The forerunner is made of wood. Later generations used the Chiyou Tao, called the oil halberd, and also called the halberd, the predecessor used by the princes and below.
棨

Name meaning
A kind of letter of talisman made of woodcut, with which you can pass the level.
qǐ
1) деревянная бирка-пропуск (в форме двузубца, для прохода через заставу или переправу) ; верительная бирка
2) * копьё, двузубец
树棨 водрузить копьё (двузубец; у ворот)
